medical_history.chief_complaint: Intermittent confusion and abnormal behavior lasting for 1 month.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Symptoms began 1 month prior to admission, featuring fluctuating mild disturbance of consciousness. There was no mention of aggravating or relieving factors.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Insulin-dependent diabetes mellitus, HIV infection, alcohol abuse, prior IV drug use, previous episodes of loss of consciousness with hypoglycemia.
medical_history.social_history: Currently treated with methadone for prior IV drug use; history of alcohol abuse.
